contents:
@黑衣法官:In Sacramento County, the shortage has complicated efforts to test patients at a nursing home facility in the suburb of Elk Grove, where an elderly patient died this week. Peter Beilenson, the county’s health director, said Tuesday that the county has access to only 20 tests per day and is having to ration those between possible cases in the community and medical professionals who may have been exposed.

Commercial labs can test milder patients, according to county officials, but many hospitals are still using only the official county lab, restricting who can be tested for the virus.

https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2020-03-11/coronavirus-testing-kits-lack-key-ingredient-causing-confusion
